parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause extended stopping distances, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle fails to stop or slows down suddenly
or the vehicle experiences extended stopping distances.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake pedal issues can cause extended stopping distances, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
or the brake pedal becomes hard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The undersized brakes can cause extended stopping distances, especially when the vehicle is fully loaded, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The vehicle takes longer to stop
or the brakes fail to stop the vehicle in emergency situations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of brake components can cause extended stopping distances, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pads overheat or crack
the brake rotors or drums warp

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed braking action can cause extended stopping distances, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: There is a delay of 0.5 to 1.5 seconds after the brakes are applied before any braking action occurs.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can cause reduced visibility while driving, especially in rainy or snowy conditions, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: wipers fail to work at all
motor still running when wipers stop working
wipers leave streaks or residue on the windshield.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear windshield wiper can cause reduced visibility while driving, especially in rainy or snowy conditions, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Rear windshield wiper fails to work
rear windshield wiper fails to park properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vibration of the outside mirrors can cause impaired vision to the rear, especially at night, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Outside mirrors vibrate when the truck is moving

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater can cause discomfort and distraction while driving, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
Transmission failure or hard shifts can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or become difficult to control, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: loud noises or vibrations during shifting

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the rear axle assembly can cause the axle to detach from the vehicle, leading to loss of control, accidents, or damage to the vehicle.
Failure of the driveshaft U-joint can cause loud noises, vibrations, and loss of power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: Loud noise coming from the underbody of the vehicle
slipping or vibration of the driveshaft U-joint.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the instrument cluster can cause the driver to lose critical information about the vehicle's speed, RPM, and other vital systems, leading to accidents or loss of control.
Alignment problems can cause uneven tire wear, loss of control, and accidents.
